name: Block-Runner
description:
Whats life like when running, as a block... it's a bit like running past blocks.
In Block-Runner, there is a tonne of difficult levels. All you have to do is dodge them but is harder than you may think. Moving is a challenge. You can't just hold down left or right, you have to tap them one by one. Told you it was a challenge.

Well then download this game now and see if you can complete the challenge.
